document_data.name: Lights in the Dark
document_data.source: [[City of Delights|City of Delights (Gem of Zakhara)]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Lights in the Dark''' was a shop located in the [[Grand Bazaar]] of [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: Located on the edge of the bazaar, this shop was easily noticed due to the variety of colored [[lantern]]s that were lit every day at dusk.
document_data.Activities: This shop sold lanterns and lamps. Their specialty revolved around illumination devices that gave off different colors. Red and blues were recommended to enhance romance, business transactions required yellow or white, green for religious events, and either purple or mauve for meals.
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Korat Minial]] owned and operated this establishment.
